docs.snippet: Men are behind more news stories than women by a nearly 2-to-1 margin across print and television platforms, though there was a slight increase in bylines and credits for women last year, a new study says....
docs.lead_paragraph: Men are behind more news stories than women by a nearly 2-to-1 margin across print and television platforms, though there was a slight increase in bylines and credits for women last year, a new study says.

headline.main: Report: Women Produce About a Third of US News Content
headline.print_headline: Report: Women Produce About a Third of US News Content

docs.snippet: Cardinal George Pell has been dogged for years by allegations that he mishandled the Catholic Church sex abuse crisis in his native Australia, and now the scrutiny is more intense than ever. Australia's latest inquiry is as high-level as it gets, ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Cardinal George Pell has been dogged for years by allegations that he mishandled the Catholic Church sex abuse crisis in his native Australia, and now the scrutiny is more intense than ever. Australia's latest inquiry is as high-level as it gets, and since Pell is now the Vatican's third-most-powerful official, the same can nearly be said for him.

headline.main: Vatican's No. 3 Fights Allegations in Australian Abuse Probe
headline.print_headline: Vatican's No. 3 Fights Allegations in Australian Abuse Probe
